content:
omega
    · by_cases hi : Nat.testBit 1 (j - i)
      · obtain hi' := Nat.testBit_one_eq_true_iff_self_eq_zero.mp hi
        have hij : j = i := by omega
        simp_all
      · have hij : i ≠ j := by
          intro h; subst h
          simp at hi
        simp_all
@[simp]
theorem getElem_twoPow {i j : Nat}
